document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of Micronectidae (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha) from Vietnam, with descriptions of 11 new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Micronecta guttatostriata Lundblad, 1933b: 101–102
, pl. I ( type locality: Java , Indonesia ).

Micronecta guttatostriata
–

, 242–243, figs 11–16 (redescription, assigned to subgenus
Lundbladella
); 1968: 775 (checklist). —

, fig. 39 (key); 2002b: 266, fig. 7 (notes, key). —

(record Cambodia ).

In Vietnam ,
M. guttatostriata
is one of two species without a strigil; the other one is
M. grisea . Micronecta guttatostriata
can be separated from the latter by its distinctly smaller size, with body length of around 2.0– 2.4 mm , and the unique colour pattern of the pronotum. In addition, the shape of the free lobe and the parameres are reliable characteristics for identifying this species.
